## Public Member Functions

### BuildDbgValue() {#a73907236c1efb52f7e21bc2103bed865}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineInstr &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;VarLocBasedImpl.cpp&#125;::VarLocBasedLDV::VarLoc::BuildDbgValue (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Create a DBG&#95;VALUE representing this VarLoc in the given function.

Copies variable-specific information such as <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocalvariable">DILocalVariable</a> and inlining information from the original DBG&#95;VALUE instruction, which may have been several transfers ago.
